summary.span: 实现 类的自定义持久性格式。

span.span: Implements a custom persistence format for the class.

summary.span: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 服务器控件可以通过使用其自己的控件生成器实现自定义的持久性格式。ASP.NET server controls can implement customized persistence formats by using their own control builder. 这可通过创建控件生成器类并将控件生成器属性添加到类。This is done by creating a control builder class and adding a control builder attribute to the class. 分析和编译页时，将使用控件生成器对象。Control builder objects are used when the page is parsed and compiled. 有关详细信息，请参阅[实现自定义持久性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac8e85a9-422e-49b8-98c0-5ade5853ea7c)。For more information, see [Implementing Custom Persistence](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac8e85a9-422e-49b8-98c0-5ade5853ea7c).

permission.span: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.
Demand value: ; Permission value: .

public: override void Init(System::Web::UI::TemplateParser ^ parser, System::Web::UI::ControlBuilder ^ parentBuilder, Type ^ type, System::String ^ tagName, System::String ^ id, System::Collections::IDictionary ^ attributes);

param.name: parser
param.span: 负责分析控件的模板分析器对象。

span.span: The template parser object responsible for parsing the control.

param.name: parentBuilder
param.span: 负责生成父控件的控件生成器对象。

span.span: The control builder object responsible for building the parent control.

param.span: 如果 不是 对象，则会引发异常。

span.span: If the is not a object, an exception is thrown.

param.name: type
param.span: 指派给生成器将创建的控件的类型。

span.span: The type that is assigned to the control that the builder will create.

param.name: tagName

span.span: The name of the tag to be built.

param.span: 这使得生成器能够支持多个标记类型。

span.span: This enables the builder to support multiple tag types.

param.name: id
param.span: 指派给控件的 特性。

span.span: The attribute that is assigned to the control.

param.name: attributes
param.span: 保存指定标记特性的 对象。

span.span: The object that holds the specified tag attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在分析过程中由 ASP.NET 页面框架调用，但不可直接在代码中调用。This method is called by the ASP.NET page framework during parsing and is not intended to be called directly in your code.

span.span: is not a object.
